daily_take.headline: Iran strike odds collapse as markets price out Trump's military gambit
daily_take.deck: Odds on a US attack by March 1 dropped 8 points to 17.5% overnight, suggesting traders are either getting dovish or betting Trump's saber-rattling stays rhetorical. $1.1M in volume shows real money moving here, not just noise. This one's become a referendum on whether we actually do it or just talk about doing it.
